data.name: Adventure Light
data.detailed_description:
Adventure Light is a beautiful and very atmospheric puzzle side-scrolling game about the boy with the magic lantern in the mysterious and dark forest.

Features

  • Pocket teleporter: put mark at desirable place and teleport back whenever you want.
  • Static two-way teleports: use anomalies as wormhole to travel between two places in a moment.
  • Throwable teleport mark: use special magic throwable object to get to all the secret places in the mystical forest.
  • Teleport-based puzzles: combine usage of various teleports to solve interesting puzzles.
  • Various interactive objects: manipulate different objects as puzzle elements to solve them all.
  • Immersive environment: dark and beautiful atmosphere will help you better immerse yourself in the mysterious world.

data.short_description: Adventure Light is a very atmospheric stylized puzzle side-scrolling game about a young boy named Steve. He is compelled to find his best friend Adam and, in his quest, he ventures onto the darkest paths of the mysterious forest.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: MacBook, MacBook Pro or iMac 2010 or later

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
